question: Select the type of each interval. <image 1>
description: The image shows a musical staff with two notes. The first note is a double whole note (breve) located on the second line from the bottom of the staff. The second note is a half note (minim) located on the fourth line from the bottom of the staff. There is a double sharp accidental placed before the second note, indicating that it should be raised by two semitones.
